text: 5.19: Ro 3.23-25; Kor 1.19-20Nza nzuai buni khare. Fhe Bakɨme, ana Krais phorga kav, mba gumgi ga mbuim, mbe panan ana kɨ thav, ana phorgap ndava bavira ki. Ana mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana wom nta ndɨkndɨgɨrga fhu. Ana mba ŋaarar muuŋv won pana gumgi phorgɨ suanga buni, ana ntan nza suaŋgi. Nza mba bunin mbe suanga, mbe ana phorgɨp ndava bavira kɨrga.
